thread.title: What a sack! Bosnian coach fired via Facebook
thread.title_full: What a sack! Bosnian coach fired via Facebook

title: What a sack! Bosnian coach fired via Facebook
text:
Sports News | 4 October 2015 01:40 CET What a sack! Bosnian coach fired via Facebook - www.allsports.com.gh 
Bosnian top flight club FK Drina Zvornik have sensationally sacked their manager Vladica Petrovic via their official Facebook page. 
Drina Zvornik's home defeat on Saturday to lowly Velez had left Petrovic's outfit at the foot of the table, and was deemed one defeat too many for the president. 
Petrovic's axing would have come as no surprise given he only collected a meagre six points from his opening 10 league games, but the manner in which he was dismissed even made the boss chortle. play
